import React from "react"; import Info from "../components/info"; function Drawer({ onClose, items=[], onRemove }) { const [isOrderComplete, setIsOrderComplete] = useState(false); const handleRemoveClick = (sneaker) => { onRemove(sneaker); } return (

{ items.map((sneaker) => (

{sneaker.title}

Price: {sneaker.price} $
handleRemoveClick(sneaker)} className="removeBtn" src="/images/btn-remove.svg" alt="Remove button"/>
)) }

: ( ) }
) } export default Drawer;
